definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Babies tumble when they are learning to walk.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿在学走路时常常跌倒。

sentences.english: Now, more than 60 percent of kindergarteners attend for a full day.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，超过百分之六十的幼儿参加了全托。

sentences.english: Scribbling can help infants and toddlers learn to draw and express themselves.
sentences.chinese: 狂草可以帮助婴幼儿学画画和表达自己。

sentences.english: The third part is countermeasures and suggestions to English education in kindergarten of Huhhot.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是呼和浩特市幼儿园英语教育对策及建议。

sentences.english: Please provide any playgroup or pre-school experience the applicant has.
sentences.chinese: 请提供有关幼儿曾修读任何亲子班或学前课程的资料。

sentences.english: So , how to use civilian game to develop the cooperative ability of cheeper ?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如何利用民间游戏培养幼儿的合作能力呢？

sentences.english: Objective To review the surgical treatment of 681 infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结681例婴幼儿先天性心脏病外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: She crushed the bootee back into the basket and squeezed past the guardhouse.
sentences.chinese: 她把幼儿小毛线鞋放进篮子里面，挤过警卫室。

sentences.english: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children .
sentences.chinese: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸婴幼儿的口鼻。

sentences.english: Orangutan mothers face up to eight years of single parenthood raising their infants.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩母亲则要做长达八年的独自养育幼儿的单亲家长。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of Qingfeifang in treating cough.
sentences.chinese: 观察清肺定哮方加减治疗婴幼儿毛细支气管炎的效果。

sentences.english: It usually first appears in young chil…
sentences.chinese: 自闭症通常首先出现在幼儿时期。

sentences.english: Lisson to the music and sing the song.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿欣赏歌曲光盘，跟唱歌曲。

sentences.english: Child as ox finds the third child from left.
sentences.chinese: 扮成牛的幼儿找出从左边数第3个小朋友。

sentences.english: The petite nursery teacher has been coming to these events for months.
sentences.chinese: 这位纤秀的幼儿园老师几个月来经常来这里。

sentences.english: The thesis is a conclusion of the study, which is about kindergarteners professional identification.
sentences.chinese: 本文是关于幼儿园教师职业认同研究的结果。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
design of a learning environment for young children, incorporating artwork designed to appeal to them/abbr. to 環創|环创[huan2 chuang4]
